data.actual_result: The tooltip is always on top of the text, even if it's cutting out
data.expected_result: The category tooltip is visible and will move below the text if out of bounds
data.short_description: When hovering over a mentioned channel, the category tooltip is always be above the text, even if it's out of the client
data.steps_to_repro: - mention a channel with <#ID> in a channel description - hover over it and observe
